summary_validation.statement: Provides comprehensive and specific coverage for all requested golf-related needs (equipment, unused fees, buggy damage, hole-in-one benefit).
summary_validation.explanation: The PDF confirms specific coverage limits under Section 36 (Golf Cover) for the Elite tier: SGD 1,000 for equipment loss/damage, SGD 500 for hole-in-one, SGD 250 for unused green fees, and SGD 500 for buggy damage.

summary_validation.statement: Offers the highest coverage limits among SOMPO tiers for essential benefits like Medical Expenses ($1M), Trip Cancellation ($15k), and Baggage ($8k).
summary_validation.explanation: Comparison of the 'Elite' column against 'Deluxe' and 'Vital' columns in the PDF confirms Elite has the highest limits: Overseas Medical Expenses (SGD 1,000,000 vs SGD 300,000/SGD 150,000), Trip Cancellation (SGD 15,000 vs SGD 6,000/SGD 5,000), and Baggage (SGD 8,000 vs SGD 5,000/SGD 3,000).

summary_validation.statement: Includes Unlimited Emergency Medical Evacuation for travellers under 70.
summary_validation.explanation: The PDF explicitly states 'Unlimited' coverage for 'Per Insured Person up to 70 years' under Section 4 (Emergency Medical Evacuation & Repatriation) for the Elite tier.
